Why Study OO Software?

Why Study OO Software?

  • Software is important to our business, our society, our lives, our livelihood
  • In the past, software development has been expensive, risky, uncertain, unpredictable
    • The software “crisis”
  • The world for which software is developed appears to be made of objects, not functions
    • The world around us is “object-oriented”
